2025-01-29.title: Meta Gains After Zuckerberg Predicts ‘Really Big Year’ in AI
2025-01-29.description: Meta Platforms Inc. Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg defended the company’s ambitious spending plans, predicting a “really big year” in which its artificial intelligence assistant will become the most widely used in the industry.

2025-01-31.title: Meta Blocked News in Canada. Ads for Scams Are Taking Its Place
2025-01-31.description: Social media platforms in Canada are hosting hundreds of ads from scam artists pretending to be news publishers, while suppressing authentic news content.

2025-01-31.title: Mark Zuckerberg reassures Meta staff about company values after policy shifts

2025-01-28.title: DeepSeek tests Meta’s ambition for open-source AI dominance
2025-01-28.description: The emergence of DeepSeek is pressure-testing Zuckerberg’s strategy and threatening the home-grown AI advantage for the U.S. Read more here

2025-01-28.title: Trump Vows ‘Near Future’ Tariffs, Calls DeepSeek Progress ‘Good’
2025-01-28.description: President Donald Trump said he would soon impose tariffs on foreign pharmaceuticals, semiconductors and metals, and heralded news of DeepSeek’s apparent progress in artificial intelligence as “a positive,” as he addressed House Republicans on Monday.

2025-01-10.title: Meta rolls back diversity and inclusion efforts in bid to appease Trump
2025-01-10.description: Meta is disbanding its DEI efforts, meaning employees aren't required to interview candidates from under-represented backgrounds. Read more.

2025-01-14.title: Meta to cut five per cent of staff, targeting lowest performers
2025-01-14.description: Meta Platforms Inc. is cutting roughly five per cent of its staff through performance-based eliminations. Read here for more

2025-01-08.title: Meta rolls back hate speech rules as Zuckerberg cites ‘recent elections’ as a catalyst
2025-01-08.description: It wasn’t just fact-checking that Meta scrapped from its platforms as it prepares for the second Trump administration. The social media giant has also loosened its rules around hate speech and abuse — again following the lead of Elon Musk’s X — specifically w…

2025-01-09.title: Meta tries letting Facebook Marketplace users view eBay listings as way to resolve EU charges
2025-01-09.description: Meta said Wednesday that it will allow some Facebook users to view eBay listings on its Marketplace service, as it tries out a possible way to resolve European Union charges of anticompetitive behavior that the bloc leveled last year. The social media company…

2025-01-09.title: The watch Mark Zuckerberg was wearing when he announced end of fact-checking is worth $1.3 million
2025-01-09.description: Mark Zuckerberg wore a rare Swiss watch worth about $1.3 million in a video explaining Meta's decision to end fact checking. Read more

2025-01-23.title: Ex-Google, Meta execs building emotionally aware AI sales agents
2025-01-23.description: Former engineering leads from Google, Meta and Samsung have launched a startup to build emotionally aware AI sales agents. Read more here

2025-01-23.title: Trump blasts EU regulators for targeting Apple, Google, Meta
2025-01-23.description: Donald Trump blasted EU regulators for targeting Apple, Google and Meta, calling cases against them “a form of taxation.” Read more here

2025-01-24.title: Meta’s Threads will soon include ads in the U.S. and Japan
2025-01-24.description: Meta Platforms Inc. will show advertising on Threads in the U.S. and Japan, opening up new revenue streams for the company. Read more here

2025-01-24.title: Meta to spend as much as $65 billion on AI in 2025
2025-01-24.description: Meta Platforms Inc. plans to invest as much as US$65 billion on projects related to artificial intelligence in 2025. Read more here

2025-02-06.title: Federal government ends Meta platforms advertising boycott
2025-02-06.description: The federal government has ended its boycott on buying advertisements on Meta platforms, including Facebook and Instagram. Read more here

2025-02-07.title: Manitoba launches Buy Local campaign with social media ads
2025-02-07.description: Manitoba's new ad campaign encouraging people to buy local is being questioned as some of the money has been spent on Meta. Read on

2025-02-11.title: Meta rally makes history as investors see return on AI offensive
2025-02-11.description: The Facebook parent’s valuation is heading to US$2 trillion for the first time and is seen as one of the cheaper big-tech plays. Read more

2025-02-17.title: Meta keeps trying to invent the future. It hasn’t worked yet | CNN Business
2025-02-17.description: Facebook kickstarted the modern social media age in the early 2000s. But its parent company Meta’s ambitions to expand over the last decade haven’t been nearly as impactful, highlighting the challenges that loom over the tech giant as it reportedly prepares f…

2025-02-20.title: Meta Platforms’ record winning streak puts stock split in view
2025-02-20.description: Meta's record-breaking rally propelled share price to a level where investors may call on the company to split its stock. Read more here

2025-02-26.title: BBC Trending: Can Community Notes clean up your feed?
2025-02-26.description: Meta has decided to abandon the use of independent fact-checkers on Facebook and Instagram in the United States, citing concerns that fact-checkers have become too politically biased. Instead, the company seems to be following X’s lead by shifting to a Commun…

2025-02-25.title: Howard Levitt: Meta plans to fire 5% of underperforming employees. Is this the return of Rank and Yank?
2025-02-25.description: Mark Zuckerberg announced plans to lay off five per cent of Meta’s lowest-performing employees. Is this the return of Rank and Yank? Read on

2025-02-27.title: Meta apologizes, fixes glitch that caused violent video recommendations on Reels | CNN Business
2025-02-27.description: Meta is apologizing for a technical error after some users said they saw violent, graphic videos in their Instagram Reels feed.

2025-03-12.title: French publishers and authors sue Meta over copyright works used in AI training
2025-03-12.description: French publishers and authors said Wednesday they’re taking Meta to court, accusing the social media company of using their works without permission to train its artificial intelligence model. Three trade groups said they were launching legal action against M…

2025-03-11.title: Ex-Meta executive: ‘People deserve to know what this company is really like’ | CNN Business
2025-03-11.description: Meta is once again facing allegations from a former employee that a growth-at-all-costs culture has caused offline harm.

2025-03-17.title: The man who orchestrated Meta’s pivot towards Trump
2025-03-17.description: Zuckerberg's most trusted political fixer for Meta has masterminded the social media giant's MAGA move

2025-03-19.title: New Global Study Finds: Sleep Apnea Patients Who Use CPAP Live Longer
2025-03-19.description: Largest ever meta-analysis on the long-term benefits of CPAP therapy, published in The Lancet Respiratory Medicine, found that in people with sleep apnea, CPAP therapy lowered the overall chance of dying by 37% and the chance of heart-related death by 55%. SA…

2025-03-24.title: Meta considers charging for Facebook and Instagram in the UK
2025-03-24.description: The firm is considering asking people to pay to remove ads if they do not want their data to be tracked.
